COMMANDS.name: commands
COMMANDS.description: Returns a list of all possible commands

COMMANDS.name: crew
COMMANDS.description: Look up a user's Crew information

COMMANDS.name: crime
COMMANDS.description: Look up a user's Crime information

COMMANDS.name: modder
COMMANDS.description: Look up a user's likelihood of being a Modder

COMMANDS.name: rid
COMMANDS.description: Look up a user's Rockstar ID

COMMANDS.name: sc
COMMANDS.description: Look up a user's Social Club Name by their Rockstar ID (Requires their wall to be public)

COMMANDS.name: garage
COMMANDS.description: Looks up the vehicles in the player's currently active Garage

COMMANDS.name: finances
COMMANDS.description: Look up a user's Finance information

COMMANDS.name: rename
COMMANDS.description: Changes a tagged user's server nickname

COMMANDS.name: verify
COMMANDS.description: Verifies a user, adding them to the GTA V role

COMMANDS.name: botmessage
COMMANDS.description: Sends a message to a channel as A1MGBot

COMMANDS.name: allow
COMMANDS.description: Adds a role as having access to a command

COMMANDS.name: deny
COMMANDS.description: Removes a role as having access to a command

COMMANDS.name: report
COMMANDS.description: Reports a person to be added to the blacklist

COMMANDS.name: blacklist
COMMANDS.description: Blacklists a user and sends them to the #blacklist channel

COMMANDS.name: unblacklist
COMMANDS.description: Removes a user from the A1MG blacklist

COMMANDS.name: check
COMMANDS.description: Checks to see if a user is on the A1MG blacklist

COMMANDS.name: blistluna
COMMANDS.description: Downloads the current A1MG Blacklist in Luna's blacklist format

COMMANDS.name: blistpara
COMMANDS.description: Downloads the current A1MG Blacklist in Paragon's blacklist format

COMMANDS.name: blistimp
COMMANDS.description: Downloads the current A1MG Blacklist in Impulse's blacklist format

COMMANDS.name: blistcherax
COMMANDS.description: Downloads the current A1MG Blacklist in Cherax's blacklist format

COMMANDS.name: suggest
COMMANDS.description: Submits a suggestion for the channel

NSFW_COMMANDS.name: boobs
NSFW_COMMANDS.description: Returns a random image of boobs

NSFW_COMMANDS.name: ass
NSFW_COMMANDS.description: Returns a random image of an ass

NSFW_COMMANDS.name: rule34
NSFW_COMMANDS.description: Returns a random image from rule34
